# 

 
 # 题目背景 
<p>NOIP2015提高组&nbsp;D2T1</p> 

 
 # 题目描述 
<p style="box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; text-indent: 2em; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, 'Microsoft YaHei', 'WenQuanYi Micro Hei', 'Microsoft YaHei UI', serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px;">一年一度的&ldquo;跳石头&rdquo;比赛又要开始了！</p>

<p style="box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; text-indent: 2em; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, 'Microsoft YaHei', 'WenQuanYi Micro Hei', 'Microsoft YaHei UI', serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px;"><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 25px;">这项比赛将在一条笔直的河道中进行,河道中分布着一些巨大岩石。组委会已经选</span><br class="contentbr" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline; line-height: 30px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px;" />
<span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 25px;">择好了两块岩石作为比赛起点和终点。在起点和终点之间,有&nbsp;N&nbsp;块岩石(不含起点和终&nbsp;点的岩石)。在比赛过程中,选手们将从起点出发,每一步跳向相邻的岩石,直至到达&nbsp;终点。</span><br class="contentbr" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline; line-height: 30px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px;" />
<span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 25px;">为了提高比赛难度,组委会计划移走一些岩石,使得选手们在比赛过程中的最短跳&nbsp;跃距离尽可能长。由于预算限制,组委会至多从起点和终点之间移走&nbsp;M&nbsp;块岩石(不能&nbsp;移走起点和终点的岩石)。</span></p> 

 
 # 输入格式 
<p style="box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; text-indent: 2em; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, 'Microsoft YaHei', 'WenQuanYi Micro Hei', 'Microsoft YaHei UI', serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px;"><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 25px;">输出文件名为&nbsp;stone.out。&nbsp;输出文件只包含一个整数,即最短跳跃距离的最大值。</span></p> 

 
 # 输出格式 
<p><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, 'Microsoft YaHei', 'WenQuanYi Micro Hei', 'Microsoft YaHei UI', serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; text-indent: 28px;">输出文件只包含一个整数，即最短跳跃距离的最大值。</span></p>

<p><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, 'Microsoft YaHei', 'WenQuanYi Micro Hei', 'Microsoft YaHei UI', serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; text-indent: 28px;"><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="height: 200px; width: 640px;" /></span></p> 

 
 # 提示 
<p style="box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; text-indent: 2em; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, 'Microsoft YaHei', 'WenQuanYi Micro Hei', 'Microsoft YaHei UI', serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px;"><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 25px;">输入输出样例&nbsp;1&nbsp;说明：将与起点距离为&nbsp;2&nbsp;和&nbsp;14&nbsp;的两个岩石移走后,最短的跳跃距离为&nbsp;4(从与起点距离&nbsp;17&nbsp;的岩石跳到距离&nbsp;21&nbsp;的岩石,或者从距离&nbsp;21&nbsp;的岩石跳到终点)。</span><br class="contentbr" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline; line-height: 30px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px;" />
<span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 25px;">另：对于&nbsp;20%的数据,0&nbsp;&le;&nbsp;M&nbsp;&le;&nbsp;N&nbsp;&le;&nbsp;10。&nbsp;对于50%的数据,0&nbsp;&le;&nbsp;M&nbsp;&le;&nbsp;N&nbsp;&le;&nbsp;100。</span><br class="contentbr" style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline; line-height: 30px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px;" />
<span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 25px;">对于&nbsp;100%的数据,0&nbsp;&le;&nbsp;M&nbsp;&le;&nbsp;N&nbsp;&le;&nbsp;50,000,1&nbsp;&le;&nbsp;L&nbsp;&le;&nbsp;1,000,000,000。</span></p>
